title: Privacy Policy for "Bengoshicchi"
intro: This Privacy Policy ("Policy") describes how we collect, use, and protect personal information through our lawyer matching and inquiry service "Bengoshicchi" ("Service").

sections.title: 1. Scope
sections.content: This Policy applies to all users ("Users") of the Service.

sections.title: 2. Definition of Personal Information
sections.content: "Personal Information" means any data that can identify an individual, such as name, email address, phone number, and address. It also includes IP addresses, cookies, and similar identifiers.

sections.title: 3. Methods of Collection
sections.content: We collect personal information in the following cases:
list: When a User registers for the Service
When a User uses the inquiry form or chat feature
Automatically via cookies or server logs for usage analysis

sections.title: 4. Purpose of Use
sections.content: We use collected personal information for:
list: Matching Users with lawyers and facilitating communication
Responding to inquiries and providing support
Verifying identity and preventing fraudulent use

sections.title: 5. Third‑Party Disclosure
sections.content: We will not share personal information with third parties except in these cases:
list: When disclosure is required by law (e.g., courts, police)
With service providers under contract to support the Service
When necessary to protect life or property in emergencies

sections.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance User experience and for analytics. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but some Service features may not work properly.

sections.title: 7. Access, Correction, Deletion Requests
sections.content: Users may request disclosure, correction, suspension, or deletion of their personal information. To make a request, please contact:

sections.title: 8. Security Measures
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures—such as access controls, encryption, and staff training—to prevent data breaches, loss, alteration, or unauthorized access.

sections.title: 9. Outsourcing
sections.content: We may outsource certain operations related to Service maintenance. In such cases, we supervise contractors under contractual obligations to protect personal information.

sections.title: 10. Compliance with Laws
sections.content: We comply with the Personal Information Protection Law and related guidelines and handle personal data appropriately.

sections.title: 11. Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this Policy without notice due to changes in laws or Service operations. Revised policies take effect upon posting on our website.
